item.title: Build OBI Client
item.description: Note on how OBI is currently built Table of Contents CI Server Details Source Code Repository Artifact Store How it All works Who has Access Gotchas CI Server Details Currently Bamboo is the CI server that builds the OBi Client ,the design principle is Build once deploy many BUILD-OBi Client Source Code Checkout checkout - obi-client Repository: obi-client ${bamboo.checkout.dir} Script Inline Working sub dirrectory echo echo echo " ****************************************** " echo " * * " echo " * DELETING node_modules.
